id.description: The unique identifier for the widget. This is usually the same as the repository name.

author.description: The name of the widget author.

description.description: A short description of the widget.

homepage_url.description: A URL to the Discord post related to the widget.

sourcecode_url.description: A URL to the source code repository of the widget.

date_created.description: The date when the widget was created or first added to the Widget Hub, in ISO 8601 format. YYYY-MM-DD

date_updated.description: The date and time when the widget was last updated, in ISO 8601 format. YYYY-MM-DD
date_updated.$comment: Authors should not include this. Generated by the build script.

version.description: The current version of the widget, following semantic versioning (e.g., 1.0.0).

entrypoint.description: Path to either a .lua file or a folder in your repository relative to the manifest file. Default "/".

install.description: key-value pairs mapping paths in the game's directory to paths in the repository relative to the manifest file.

manual_install_only.description: Set to true if the widget can only be installed manually.
manual_install_only.$comment: Optional: Overriden to be true until phase 2 is complete.
